title: Pain Management & Regenerative Orthopaedics
description: Doctor-led regenerative medicine that reduces chronic pain, restores mobility, and prevents invasive surgery.
longDescription: Persistent pain shouldn’t dictate your lifestyle. At Dr. SNA Clinic we treat the source—not just the symptoms—using platelet-rich plasma, cellular therapies, and targeted rehabilitation. Every protocol is overseen by regenerative pain specialists who combine imaging, ultrasound-guided injections, and physiotherapy to help you move without anxiety.
